title: The Highland heart of Nova Scotia
creator_credit: Ned Norwood, Margaret Perry and Nova Scotia Information Service
brief_description: Outlines history of Cape Breton Island, Nova Scotia highlighting French and Scottish influence on its development. Film depicts traditional music, dancing and crafts and features various places of interest including the Graham Bell Museum, Fort Louisberg, Cabot Trail, etc.
